body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     History & Culture     Park History     Historic Tribes     Associated Tribes                  Associated Tribes        Yellowstone National Park has 26 associated tribes. NPS / Yellowstone Spatial Analysis Center        Assiniboine and Sioux  Blackfeet  Cheyenne River Sioux  Coeur d’Alene  Comanche  Colville Reservation  Crow  Crow Creek Sioux  Eastern Shoshone  Flandreau Santee Sioux  Gros Ventre and Assiniboine  Kiowa  Lower Brule Sioux  Nez Perce Northern Arapaho  Northern Cheyenne  Oglala Sioux  Rosebud Sioux Salish and Kootenai  Shoshone–Bannock  Sisseton Wahpeton  Spirit Lake  Standing Rock Sioux  Turtle Mountain Band of the Chippewa  Umatilla Reservation  Yankton Sioux   Note: Map shows tribal reservations; it does not show historic territory.       More Information  Modern Management  Ethnography: How does a group of people identify itself?
title: Yellowstone National Park: Associated Tribes
